properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO , NICKNAME , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , COUNT , TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "WRITE_DATE" FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO , NICKNAME , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , COUNT , TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "WRITE_DATE" FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE WRITE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO , MEM_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , REF_BNO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_BOARD_NO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? )
